name: Mr. Q - Magnetic Cube Arcade
description:
Join Mr. Q for an amazing adventure! Help cute robots travel around the earth by using your wisdom and magnetic power, and help them back home!

Four main mechanics in this magnetic game: Attract, Rebel, Catapult and Suspend. A lot techniques are waiting for you to discover.

Eight various maps: Egypt, Viking, China, Japan and so on. Across the earth right now!
The ultimate challenges: Maze, Obstacle, Escape, Puzzle. More than 240 missions!

Driving the magical UFO crossing whole universe! Try to get as far as you can, and share to Facebook challenge your friends!

And more!
Unique map BGMs! Bunches cute robot outfits!
Join us now! Enjoy an unprecedented magnetic travel!

If you have any advice in your travel, please send an e-mail to georgina@good321.net
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Mr.Q.GAME
